generate_subtypes.description: If true, will generate subtypes of item_type and assign cost based on cost integer

items.description: If subtypes generator meets the item from this list, it will not generate icon for this

subtypes_share_parent_icon.description: If true, subtypes generator will use parent item icons as item icon. If there is icon override, it will use the overriden icon of parent item

subtypes_share_cost.description: If true, subtypes generator will use parent cost as item cost. If there is cost override, it will use the overriden cost of parent item

exclude_base.description: If true, base item will not be generated

loadout_type.description: If set, item will be added to loadout of this type
